attributes.action: Stop our taxmoney paying for African hate-preachers like Sentamu
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You pay taxes, now you have to reward talibans and sentamu-like minded people. This has to stop, if the UK wants to be a Western democracy, it has to stop this grande-thief, and stop having people automatically picked to the upper chamber just because they re religious leaders. Stop using my taxmoney for hollier-than-thou foreign parasites!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
